sa: Sally Morgan, Baroness Morgan of Huyton
q: names new chair Education Secretary Michael Gove has appointed Sally Morgan, Baroness Morgan of Huyton as the new chair of Ofsted. The new chair will focus on pupil attainment, teaching and learning, leadership, behaviour and safety. I am delighted to be taking up this post.
